title: Editorial Board – Biotech Express Magazine
cleaned_text:
Prof Ashok Pandey

 D.Phil., FRSB., FNASc., FBRS., FIOBB., FISEES., FAMI.

 Distinguished Scientist, CSIR-IITR

 Former Dy Director & Chief Scientist, Centre for Biotechnology & Biofuel

 Division, CSIR- National Institute for Interdisciplinary Science and Technology

 Founder, Biotech Research Society of India.

Prof Mishra Kaushala Prasad

 Ph.D., F.M.A.Sc., FNASc.

 Former Head, Radiation Biology Dept., BARC, India

 Former Vice-Chancellor, Nehru Gram Bharati University

 Founder, Radiation Biology Society, Founder President, Society for

 Radiation Research , India( SRRI)

 Mumbai, President, Asian Association for Radiation Research (AARR)2017-2021

Prof Ramareddy V Guntaka, Ph.D

 Chairman and Chief Scientist, Sudarshan Biotech Pvt Ltd.

 TSIIC Park, Nacharam, Hyderabad, India.

 Emeritus Professor, Department of Microbiology , Immunology and Biochemistry

 University of Tennessee Health Science Center, Memphis, USA.

 Ex-Chief Scientist, Shantha Biotech, India.

Prof. Pallu Reddanna, Ph.D

 BSR Faculty Fellow, School of Life Sciences, University of Hyderabad, India,

 Executive President, Federation of Asian Biotech Associations (FABA)

Dr Mark R. Wilkins

 Nebraska Corn Checkoff Presidential Chair

 Professor and Graduate Chair, Biological Systems Engineering

 Professor, Food Science and Technology

 Director, Industrial Agricultural Products Center

 Courtesy Professor, Chemical and Biomolecular Engineering

 Institute of Agriculture and Natural Resources

 College of Engineering

 University of Nebraska–Lincoln, USA.

Dr Huu Hao Ngo Ph.D. FIWA D-FIBA

 Distinguished Professor and Deputy Director, Centre for Technology in Water and Wastewater (CTWW)

 Co-Director, Joint Research Centre for Environmental Green Bioprocess (CEGB)

 Faculty of Engineering and Information Technology (FEIT)

 University of Technology, Sydney, Australia.

Dr Samir Kumar Khanal, Ph.D., P.E.

 Professor in Dept. of Molecular Biosciences and Bioengineering

 University of Hawaii, Honolulu, Hawaii.

Dr Ir. Ts. Dr. Pau-Loke SHOW

 Professor and Director of Sustainable Food Processing Research Centre

 Department of Chemical and Environmental Engineering,

 University of Nottingham Malaysia.

Dr Carlos Ricardo Soccol 

 Professor and Head in Bioprocess Engineering and Biotechnology Division

 Federal University of Parana, Brazil.

Dr. Rachna Agarwal

 Associate Professor, Department of Neurochemistry

 Institute of Human Behaviour and Allied Sciences (IHBAS)

 Delhi, India.

Dr Yen Wah TONG

 Associate Professor in Dept of Chemical and Biomolecular Engineering

 National University of Singapore.

Dr Zhongfang Lei

 Associate Professor in Department of Life and Environmental Sciences,

 University of Tsukuba, Japan.

Dr. Sharvan Sehrawat

 Associate Professor in Department of Biological Sciences

 Indian Institute of Science Education and Research, Mohali
